item.description:
Business Professionals for Arthritis

Jingle Bell Run/Walk for Arthritis at Cooper River Park

Cooper River Park
N. Park Drive
Pennsauken , NJ 08110

Distances: 5.00 K / 3.10 M

Registration Starts: 8:30AM
Race starts: 10:00 AM at Camden Boat House

Fun Race/Walk, Charity Benefit, Online Entry available

Jingle Bells for Sneakers (optional)

Awards/Prizes

High Quality T- shirt

Beat the Cold - Goody Bag

Lunch at the Finish Line

And Much More!!

Registration Fee: $25

Contact Information:
Paula Staton
Arthritis Foundation - NJ Chapter
9 Tanner Street
Haddonfield , New Jersey 08033
856-616-8000
pstaton@arthritis.org

December 8, 2007 - Pennsauken , NJ

www.2007JBRWCooperRiverPark.kintera.org

2007 Jingle Bell Run - Cooper River Park Pennsauken, NJ on Saturday, December 8, 2007

Get in the spirit this holiday season at the Arthritis Foundations Jingle Bell Run/Walk for Arthritis. Be one of the thousands of runners and walkers who hit the nations pavements, pathways and parks this winter to fight the nation?s number one cause of disability.

Jingle Bell Run/Walk is a fun and festive way to kick off your holidays by helping others! Wear a holiday themed costume. Tie jingle bells to your shoelaces. Run or walk a 5 kilometer route with your team members and celebrate the season by giving.

We are taking this challange as a team to fight arthritis. At least everyone on this team knows of at least 2 people who has arthritis. Not only does arthritis affect older people, it also affects the young, the innocent. Of course doing this walk may not find a cure, but theres a chance that one walk might! By doing this walk we are hoping for a better tomorrow!

My goal is to raise $1000 in donations total between all my meetup groups. I look forward to your support.

Click here to make your donation and register to walk/run....
Business Professionals for Arthritis
item.name: 2007 Jingle Bell Run/Walk for Arthritis at Cooper River Park
